title: Logging from backup-stream is noisy

comments_data.body: I guess #13913 won't make things worse because it only changes the format of the log but haven't changed when and how the logs being printed. 🤔

So I guess you don't start any log backup task right?

It seems that once there isn't any log backup task, this log would be printed when a region get split or merged. Truly that is noisy, perhaps we'd better mute them once there isn't a task.
